name: The only ONE GUN
description:
Features
  • 23-different bullets
  • Combine bullets wiith other to new
  • 3 levels for playin
  • Opening new random cards
Instructions
  • Move - WASD + Space
  • Shooting - Mouse left
  • Before running build your weapon by cards 
  • Cards order is important because there may be different connections
  • Collect coins at level on ground or from killing enemy
  • One new card cost 100 coins
Metafab

This platform allows you to register in the game and not lose all your accumulated data, keying unique cards and coins
